thread.title: Russian tourism agency wants Vostochny spaceport become a tourism attraction
thread.title_full: Russian tourism agency wants Vostochny spaceport become a tourism attraction

author: eTN Managing Editor
title: Russian tourism agency wants Vostochny spaceport become a tourism attraction
text:
Russian tourism agency wants Vostochny spaceport become a tourism attraction   
Sep 03, 2015 eTN   
Head of the Russian Federal Agency for Tourism (Rostourism) Oleg Safonov has suggested making the Vostochny cosmodrome a tourist facility. 
"The cosmodrome is a unique facility, such facilities can be counted on the fingers of one hand, they should be used in the tourism industry," the Russian tourism agency's head said 
"A tourist facility may be created on the basis of the Vostochny spaceport, which will be accessible for foreign tourists as well," Safonov said at a round-table discussion at the Eastern Economic Forum in Vladivostok. 
"The cosmodrome is a unique facility, such facilities can be counted on the fingers of one hand, they should be used in the tourism industry," the Rostourism head said.
